fetchedAttachments.css:
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:600" rel="stylesheet"> .tableau {
  color: white;
}

h1 {
  margin-top: 0px;
  padding-left: 20px;
  text-align: left;
  float: left;
  font-size: 3em;
  font-family: 'Source Sans Pro';
}

h2 {
  margin-top: 0px;
  padding-right: 20px;
  text-align: right;
  float: right;
  font-size: 2em;
  font-family: 'Source Sans Pro';
}

.sujet {
  padding-left: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-family: 'Source Sans Pro';
  vertical-align: middle;
  font-size: 1, 5em;
  width: 150px;
}

li {
  list-style-type: none;
}

table {
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: white;
  width: 100%;
  table-layout: fixed;
}

td {
  vertical-align: text-top;
  border-width: 10px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: white;
  width: 20vw;
  height: 20vw;
  color: white;
  padding: 20px;
  font-size: 1, 5em;
  font-family: 'Source Sans Pro';
}

.fantastique {
  background-color: #212322;
}

.science {
  background-color: #D6001C;
}

.poesie {
  background-color: #19993B;
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: black;
}

<button id="tout">afficher toutes les citations</button>
<button id="humour">Humour</button>
<button id="anglais">Citations en anglais</button>
<button id="francais">Citations en français</button>

<article class="citation anglais">“So many books, so little time.” 
― Frank Zappa</article>
<article class="citation anglais">“Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead.” 
― Charles Bukowski</article>
<article class="citation humour anglais">“I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.” 
― Woody Allen</article>
<article class="citation humour francais">Il ne faut pas désespérer des imbéciles, avec un peu d'entrainement on peut en faire des militaires.  - Pierre Desproges</article>
<article class="citation humour francais">"Mozart était tellement précoce qu'à 35 ans il était déjà  mort."  - Pierre Desproges</article>
<article class="citation humour francais">"Comme le pou, le coiffeur est un parasite du cheveu."  - Pierre Desproges</article>
<article class="citation humour anglais">“Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.” 
― Albert Einstein</article>
<article class="citation anglais">“You would think that a rock star being married to a supermodel would be one of the greatest things in the world. It is.” - David Bowie</article>
<article class="citation humour francais">"Il va falloir qu'un jour enfin je me décide à lire les livres que, depuis trente ans, je conseille à mes amis de lire."  - Sacha Guitry</article>
<article class="citation anglais">“Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could.” 
― Charles J. Sykes</article>
<article class="citation anglais">“I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.” 
― Douglas Adams</article>
